body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Environmental Factors     Soundscape / Noise     Shark Valley Sound Gallery                  Shark Valley Sound Gallery         American alligator. NPS photo  Below, listen to the calls of a couple of alligators, various species of frogs and other amphibians, an anhinga, and a great egret. Afterwards, try identifying them for yourself in a game of Name that Tune: Everglades Edition.             Amphibian Chorus     Listen to an amphibian chorus recorded at the Shark Valley site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-16     Download Original File: ever-EVER0022008-08-16amphibianchorus1.mp3122 KB                     Pig Frog     Listen to a pig frog recorded at the Shark Valley site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-16     Download Original File: ever-2008-08-16EVER002PigFrog.mp327 KB                     Two Pig Frogs     Listen to two pig frogs recorded at the Shark Valley site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-16     Download Original File: ever-2008-08-16EVER002TwoPigFrogs.mp331 KB                     Cricket Frog     Listen to a cricket frog recorded at the Shark Valley site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-16     Download Original File: ever-EVER0022008-08-16cricketfrog.mp3106 KB                     Green Tree Frog     Listen to a green tree frog recorded at the Shark Valley site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-16     Download Original File: ever-EVER0022008-08-16greentreefrog.mp3122 KB                     Southern Leopard Frog     Listen to a Southern leopard frog recorded at the Shark Valley site. You may need to increase your volume setting up to hear this recording.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-24     Download Original File: ever-EVER0022008-08-24southernleopard.mp362 KB                     Unknown Amphibian     Listen to an unknown amphibian recorded at the Shark Valley site.  Perhaps you know what species this is?     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-16     Download Original File: ever-2008-08-16EVER002unknownamphib.mp364 KB                     Another Unknown Amphibian     Listen to an a second unknown amphibian recorded at the Shark Valley site.  Perhaps you know what species this is?     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-16     Download Original File: ever-2008-08-16EVER002unknownamphib2.mp3120 KB                     Anhinga     Listen to an anhinga recorded at the Shark Valley site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-04-20     Download Original File: ever-EVERSHRKRVRAnhinga200804200800.mp3521 KB                     Great Egret     Listen to a great egret recorded at the Shark Valley site.       Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-16     Download Original File: ever-EVER0022008-08-16greategret1.mp3120 KB                     Alligator     Listen to an American alligator recorded at the Shark Valley site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-24     Download Original File: ever-EVER0022008-08-24alligator3.mp3181 KB                     Another alligator     Listen to another American alligator recorded at the Shark Valley site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-28     Download Original File: ever-EVER0022008-08-28alligator.mp3203 KB                Acoustic monitoring sites in Everglades National Park.
title: Everglades National Park: Shark Valley Sound Gallery
